title.narrative: Strategic Climate Institutions Programme (SCIP)- Fund Manager of the Government and Civil Society pillar

description.narrative: This activity (Strategic Climate Institutions Programme (SCIP)- Fund Manager of the Government and Civil Society pillar) is a component of Strategic Climate Institutions Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £5,044,062. This component benefits Ethiopia, and works in the following sector(s): Environmental policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Bank, Crown Agents Limited, KPMG East Africa. The start date is 16-06-2011 and the end date is 30-12-2016.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Environment - Water, Natural Resource Management and Environment - Environment - policy, planning and administration
